inclusion.criterion: Females and males aged between 40-75 years
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: A diagnosis of type 2 DM based on one of the following criteria (ADA - 2010)
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Known history of type 2 diabetes mellitus on treatment
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: At screening, age below 40 years and above 75 years.
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Type 1 diabetes mellitus (patients with a history of ketoacidosis, age of onset of DM before 25 years of age, BMI <21 kg/m2 and use of insulin without a concomitant oral hypoglycemic agent)
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Patients with uncontrolled hypertension (systolic blood pressure [SBP] > 160/90 mmHg) or hypotension (SBP of <=100 mm Hg) at screening.
exclusion.label: not_met
